TRAINING AT AGE-WELL

At AGE-WELL, we know that our trainees and early career professionals are the catalyst that will drive Canada’s leadership in AgeTech. We are committed to fostering this innovative energy through EPIC, the Early Professionals, Inspired Careers Program. Aimed at students, postdoctoral fellows, early career researchers, research professionals, clinicians, and recent grads, EPIC provides AGE-WELL members access to exclusive educational programming, experiential opportunities, funding, and mentorship.

HQP AFFILIATE MEMBERSHIP PROGRAM

We offer access to EPIC, entirely free of charge, through our Affiliates Membership Program.

Eligibility

To be considered for the AGE-WELL Affiliates Membership you must be engaged in study, research or work aligned with the mission and vision of AGE-WELL.

Benefits

Membership in AGE-WELL through our Affiliates Program grants access to:
  1. membership in a pan-Canadian knowledge community
  2. access to our communications and platforms to keep you informed about what’s happening in AgeTech and connect you with 1000+ others in this sector
  3. access to AGE-WELL exclusive programming including 60+ webinars and seminars per year
  4. access to resources on our members’ intranet, potential communications and participant recruitment support
  5. eligibility to apply for internal funding competitions and participate in activities such as our conferences, Summer Institute, video competitions, and hackathons
  6. eligibility to participate in AGE-WELL supported experiential learning opportunities including mentorship, internships, and lab exchanges
  7. access to AGE-WELL developed online courses including the AGE-WELL Innovators of Tomorrow certificate program.

Process

Once your application is reviewed, you will be notified via email and asked to sign and return the AGE-WELL Conflict of Interest and Non-Disclosure statements to training@agewell-nce.ca.

Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis throughout the year.

ReportSection.name: Application
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Statement of Research Focus
Membership in AGE-WELL is aimed at those studying, researching, or working in AgeTech. Recent graduates, clinicians, and those with an active interest in AgeTech that aligns with AGE-WELL’s mission and vision are also encouraged to apply.
In this section, applicants should describe their research foci or research interests as they relate to AGE-WELL and our identified priorities.
Please address the following in your response.
  • Are you currently engaged in research? If yes, please describe your work and how it connects to AGE-WELL. Why is your project important? Who is your target user population(s)? What is the expected impact of your research?
  • If you are not currently engaged in research, please describe your research interests and how it connects to AGE-WELL.
{$item}

Statement of Training or Career Focus
In this section, applicants should describe their current academic status or career status.
Please address the following in your response.
  1. Are you currently a student, postdoctoral fellow, or recent graduate (within 3 years)? If yes, please describe your current academic status. How does your current research focus relate to AgeTech?
  2. If not a student, are you currently working in this sector? Please describe. What is the expected impact of your work?
{$item}

Biography and Career Goals
AGE-WELL activities are geared towards the needs of our membership. In this section, applicants should describe their goals and why they are seeking membership in the network.
Please address the following in your response.
  1. What are your current academic or career goals? Where you see yourself in 5-10 years?
  2. How you see AGE-WELL helping you to achieve your goals?
{$item}

Alignment to the Mission and Goals of AGE-WELL
AGE-WELL is a unique Canadian network that brings everyone together to develop technologies and services for healthy aging. We’re also training the next generation of innovators in this field, and making Canada a world leader in technologies that help aging populations everywhere.
In this section, describe how you and your research or work fits with AGE-WELL’s vision, mission and values.
Please address the following in your response.
  1. How do you see yourself and/or your work making a real-world impact to improve the quality of life for older adults and/or caregivers?
  2. AGE-WELL members work outside of disciplinary boundaries. Please describe your comfort level or willingness to engage with methods and disciplines beyond your own. Why is this important?
{$item}
